title: Hevron
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Ukranian, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Typical Ukrainian and Kosher Jewish cuisine. English speaking service, can help with vegan alternatives. Find in-house-made falafel with hummus, potato dishes, vegan varenikis with potatoes and cherries, and often a vegan poppyseed cake.
